Applicant : Bell, Joshua
School (district) : Jefferson Middle School (Caldwell School District)
Role(s) : Middle School Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I want to be a part of this program to deepen my understanding of STEM fields and gain firsthand industry experience that I can integrate into my ELA instruction. This opportunity will allow me to design lessons that connect literacy skills to real-world applications, fostering critical thinking and career awareness among my students. By exposing them to STEM-related content and careers through authentic examples, I hope to inspire them to see how their reading, writing, and problem-solving skills are essential in a wide range of future opportunities. Ultimately, this experience will help me better prepare my students to succeed in an increasingly STEM-driven world.
This applicant likes work environments that are:

STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* In-Person
	* Remote
	* Hybrid

EXPERIENCE
Grade Levels: 
	* No specific STEM domain experience


Instructional Experience:
	* Elementary: 
	* Secondary:  
	* Adult:

	* spreadsheet software:        
	* word processing:             
	* presentation software:       
	* project management software: 
	* administrative software:       2082502444
	* public speaking:

	* No

LinkedIn Profile : 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I want to be a part of this program to deepen my understanding of STEM fields and gain firsthand industry experience that I can integrate into my ELA instruction. This opportunity will allow me to design lessons that connect literacy skills to real-world applications, fostering critical thinking and career awareness among my students. By exposing them to STEM-related content and careers through authentic examples, I hope to inspire them to see how their reading, writing, and problem-solving skills are essential in a wide range of future opportunities. Ultimately, this experience will help me better prepare my students to succeed in an increasingly STEM-driven world.
STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Trades & Industry (e.g. manufacturing, automotive, construction, etc.)
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.)

School (district) : Jefferson Middle School (Caldwell School District)
Role(s) : Middle School Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I want to be a part of this program to deepen my understanding of STEM fields and gain firsthand industry experience that I can integrate into my ELA instruction. This opportunity will allow me to design lessons that connect literacy skills to real-world applications, fostering critical thinking and career awareness among my students. By exposing them to STEM-related content and careers through authentic examples, I hope to inspire them to see how their reading, writing, and problem-solving skills are essential in a wide range of future opportunities. Ultimately, this experience will help me better prepare my students to succeed in an increasingly STEM-driven world.
STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Trades & Industry (e.g. manufacturing, automotive, construction, etc.)
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.)

By exposing them to STEM-related content and careers through authentic examples, I hope to inspire them to see how their reading, writing, and problem-solving skills are essential in a wide range of future opportunities. 	* I want to be a part of this program to deepen my understanding of STEM fields and gain firsthand industry experience that I can integrate into my ELA instruction. This opportunity will allow me to design lessons that connect literacy skills to real-world applications, fostering critical thinking and career awareness among my students. By exposing them to STEM-related content and careers through authentic examples, I hope to inspire them to see how their reading, writing, and problem-solving skills are essential in a wide range of future opportunities. Ultimately, this experience will help me better prepare my students to succeed in an increasingly STEM-driven world.
STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Trades & Industry (e.g. manufacturing, automotive, construction, etc.)
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.) 

EXPERIENCE
Grade Levels: 
	* 5
	* 6
	* 7
	* 8
	* 9
	* 10



STEM Domain Experience
	* No specific STEM domain experience

Business software & skills:
	* Spreadsheet Software (MS Excel or Google Sheets)	* Presentation Software (MS Powerpoint or Google Slides)	* Public Speaking / Group Presentation	* Email & Administrative Software	* 
Instructional work they are open to during externship:
Elementary teaching : Yes
Secondary Teaching : Yes
Adult Teaching : Yes
Camp counselor : No
Curriculum design : No
Externship durations they are available for:
Other interesting experience:


LOGISTICS
Residence : Nampa

	* In-Person	* Remote	* Hybrid	*

CONTACT
	* Primary Email : JBell@caldwellschools.org
	* Secondary Email : daddio.bell@gmail.com
	* Phone : 2082502444
	* Communication & Availability : Monday through Friday after 3pm or weekends
Applicant : Bell, Joshua
School (district) : Jefferson Middle School (Caldwell School District)
Role(s) : Middle School Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I want to be a part of this program to deepen my understanding of STEM fields and gain firsthand industry experience that I can integrate into my ELA instruction. This opportunity will allow me to design lessons that connect literacy skills to real-world applications, fostering critical thinking and career awareness among my students. By exposing them to STEM-related content and careers through authentic examples, I hope to inspire them to see how their reading, writing, and problem-solving skills are essential in a wide range of future opportunities. Ultimately, this experience will help me better prepare my students to succeed in an increasingly STEM-driven world.
STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Trades & Industry (e.g. manufacturing, automotive, construction, etc.)
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.) 

EXPERIENCE
Grade Levels: 
	* 5
	* 6
	* 7
	* 8
	* 9
	* 10



STEM Domain Experience
	* No specific STEM domain experience

Business software & skills:
	* Spreadsheet Software (MS Excel or Google Sheets)	* Presentation Software (MS Powerpoint or Google Slides)	* Public Speaking / Group Presentation	* Email & Administrative Software	* 
Instructional work they are open to during externship:
Elementary teaching : Yes
Secondary Teaching : Yes
Adult Teaching : Yes
Camp counselor : No
Curriculum design : No
Externship durations they are available for:
Other interesting experience:

Residence : Nampa

	* In-Person	* Remote	* Hybrid	*

Instructional work they are open to during externship:
Elementary teaching : Yes
Secondary Teaching : Yes
Adult Teaching : Yes
Camp counselor : No
Curriculum design : No
Externship durations they are available for:
Other interesting experience:


LOGISTICS
Residence : Nampa
Open to:
	* In-Person	* Remote	* Hybrid	* 


CONTACT
	* Primary Email : JBell@caldwellschools.org
	* Secondary Email : daddio.bell@gmail.com
	* Phone : 2082502444
	* Communication & Availability : Monday through Friday after 3pm or weekends
Applicant : Bell, Joshua
School (district) : Jefferson Middle School (Caldwell School District)
Role(s) : Middle School Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I want to be a part of this program to deepen my understanding of STEM fields and gain firsthand industry experience that I can integrate into my ELA instruction. This opportunity will allow me to design lessons that connect literacy skills to real-world applications, fostering critical thinking and career awareness among my students. By exposing them to STEM-related content and careers through authentic examples, I hope to inspire them to see how their reading, writing, and problem-solving skills are essential in a wide range of future opportunities. Ultimately, this experience will help me better prepare my students to succeed in an increasingly STEM-driven world.
STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Trades & Industry (e.g. manufacturing, automotive, construction, etc.)
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.) 

EXPERIENCE
Grade Levels: 
	* 5
	* 6
	* 7
	* 8
	* 9
	* 10



STEM Domain Experience
	* No specific STEM domain experience

	* Spreadsheet Software (MS Excel or Google Sheets)	* Presentation Software (MS Powerpoint or Google Slides)	* Public Speaking / Group Presentation	* Email & Administrative Software	*
